original: intros Hlim Hdecr. apply is_lim_LimInf_seq in Hlim. unfold is_LimInf_seq in Hlim. intros n. specialize (Hlim (posreal_of_R (1 + Rabs (u n - l)))). destruct Hlim as [_ [N H]]. specialize (H n). assert (N <= n)%nat as Hn by lia. apply H in Hn. unfold posreal_of_R in Hn. simpl in Hn. unfold Rabs in Hn. destruct (Rcase_abs (u n - l)). - lra. - apply Rplus_lt_reg_l in Hn. auto using Rle_trans with real.
